alert.note: Alert for Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 29 at 7:29PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Choctaw, western Washington, southeastern Wayne and Greene Counties through 830 PM CDT... At 729 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles south of Clara to 12 miles west of State Line to 6 miles northeast of McLain. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Clara, Millry, McLain, State Line, Buckatunna, Silas and Fruitdale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southeastern Mississippi. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
